member.summary: All commands in this queue, as strings. TODO: Replace list with more efficient handler (Linked list, perhaps?)

member.summary: A list of all variables saved in this queue.

member.summary: Whether the queue can be delayed (EG, via a WAIT command). Almost always true.

member.summary: How long until the queue may continue.

member.name: T:Frenetic.CommandSystem.QueueCmds.RunCommand
member.summary: A command to allow running scripts from the script folder.

member.summary: Constructs the run command.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CommandSystem.QueueCmds.RunCommand.OnScriptRanPreEvent
member.summary:
The first event fired in a sequence of three.
Fires when a a script is going to be ran, cancellable.
Contains the name of the script only.
Second: . Third:

member.name: F:Frenetic.CommandSystem.QueueCmds.RunCommand.OnScriptRanEvent
member.summary:
The second event fired in a sequence of three.
Fires when a a script is about to be ran, cancellable.
Contains a validly constructed object.
First: . Third: .

member.name: F:Frenetic.CommandSystem.QueueCmds.RunCommand.OnScriptRanPostEvent
member.summary:
The third event fired in a sequence of three.
Fires when a a script has been ran, monitor-only.
First: . Second: .

member.name: T:Frenetic.CVarFlag
member.summary: The various possible information flags a CVar can hold.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.None
member.summary: No information.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.ReadOnly
member.summary: This flag cannot be edited, and exists to represent system information.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.Textual
member.summary: This flag should be treated as text.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.Numeric
member.summary: This tag should be treated as a number.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.Boolean
member.summary: This flag should be treated as true/false.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.Delayed
member.summary: This flag won't immediately have an effect when edited.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.UserMade
member.summary: This flag was made by a user.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.InitOnly
member.summary: This flag can only be modified during load time.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.ServerControl
member.summary: This flag is on a client, but controlled by the server.

member.name: F:Frenetic.CVarFlag.DoNotSave
member.summary: This flag should not be saved across system restarts. Useful for scripts to use when tracking temporary data.

member.summary: The internal array. NOTE: INTERNAL USE ONLY.

member.summary: The true length of the array, not counting things before the head or after the end.

member.summary: How far the can get before the buffer is forcibly shortened. Defaults to 500.

member.summary: Access a member of the

member.summary: Initializes the with specified initial entries.

member.summary: Initializes the with a specified capacity.
member.param: The number of items to expect to hold, is non-definite.

member.name: M:Frenetic.ListQueue`1.Peek
member.summary: Returns the item at head of the queue, without removing it, if it has one.

member.name: M:Frenetic.ListQueue`1.Pop
member.summary: Takes the first object off the queue and removes it, if it has one. On rare occasions, expensive (if head reaches the max).

members.member:
Adds an object to the end of the queue. On rare occasions, expensive (if internal buffer must expand).
MThe object to push onto the queue.

member.name: M:Frenetic.ListQueue`1.MoveHeadBack
member.summary: Return the to a 0 index. Expensive.

member.name: M:Frenetic.ListQueue`1.Expand(System.Int32)
member.summary: Expands the 's internal buffer. Expensive.
member.param: The amount to expand it by.

member.name: M:Frenetic.ListQueue`1.Clear
member.summary: Effectively empties the ListQueue by scrapping the original internal buffer, and setting Length and Head to 0. Mildly expensive.

member.name: M:Frenetic.ListQueue`1.Insert(System.Int32,`0[])
member.summary: Inserts entries to the buffer. Expensive.
member.param: The place to start inserting at.

member.name: T:Frenetic.TextStyle
